Detailed Description

This class represents a Euclidean Plane, to be used in 2D or 3D Space.

It is used, for example, in the Cam3 class to find the clipping planes in all directions.

See also:
Cam3
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Plane::Plane (  )

Default constructor.

Defines the Plane to be on the origin, facing up in the y-axis.
